mapper.update: INSERT INTO `sys_user` (user_gid, `nickname`,`email`,head_img_url, create_time,update_time) VALUES ( #{userGid}, #{nickname},#{email},#{headImgUrl}, NOW(),NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE update_time=VALUES(update_time);
mapper.select:
SELECT id AS id, CONCAT(email, ' - ', nickname, if(user_status = 0, '(已冻结)', '')) AS title, star_user AS indexShow FROM sys_user
star_user = 0
star_user > 0
AND salt != ''
AND (email like '%${name}%' OR nickname like '%${name}%')
ORDER BY star_user, nickname
